text: And coupled with two royal captains delivering the message...
That geezer kid sure can see into the future, huh.
I get it now...He used the power of his royal privilege to convince the people here...
That blasted Julius...He does whatever he wants, even when he's not here...
Your so-called "demon culprit" has been dealt with by magic knights, and thus, the country's crisis has been averted.
Essentially postponing his sentence until he can find proof of his innocence...
So they pigeonholed the problem of placing the responsibility for the crisis on the magic knights by "exiling the possessed child."
